posts.postText:
1) What position are you applying for:Jail Break
2) Your age:13
3) Your location:CA,USA
4) Current In-Game Name: Bobdoyle
5) Steam ID & Link to your Steam Community Profile:STEAM_0:1:17110879,http://steamcommunity.com/id/xdustinx199
6) Tell us about yourself:I Like To play NNJG I Hang Out With Friends as a Hobby Im 13 And Im Confident in myself Sometimes
7) How did you find out about NNJG:Myself
8) How long have you been involved with NNJG and/or Shadow's servers:Couple Months Like 6 or 5 Months Now :D
9) How long have you been a registered user on Steam:Hmmm Cant Remeber i think in 2008 i registered
10) What you can bring to the NNJG Team:Less Ragers(QQERS),Happiness, No Disrespect (i can try to make people not disrespect)
11) Why do you want to be part of the NNJG Team:Because I always wanted to be Something Part Of NNJG I like want to know other People More Better as a Mod/Admin
12) Do you have any past experience with the position you're applying for:Yes and if u want to know i've been Mod/Admin In Flood,TTT,Zombie And Jail for like a week.. until someone like ddosed it forever
13) Have you ever posted a ban request, and if so, was it accepted:yes i posted Like 8 Ban request And 7 out of 8 of them got Accepted
14) How often do you play on an NNJG server:Pacific Time Weekdays 4pm-10pm Weekends 4pm-12 am
15) Do you own a decent microphone, and do you frequently utilize it:i own a decent Mic and i use it alot Until someone Says Its annoying so i stop 
16) How fast/well can you type:Well I did a Computer Test At my school and One of my teachers says i did 80 words per minute? Sometimes 50 Don't know why
17) What is your favorite and least favorite aspect of NNJG:My Favorite is people using the right powers for NNJG my least favorite is People Abusing it 
18) Any other comments or information you can provide:ill try my best To make Jail Break as Fun as possible if i am possibly Mod

Sorry, but I don't think you've ever played jail before the apps opened.
In addition, you seem to think 14 comes after 14...

This is insulting. You dont even play a minute of jail, and yet you decide to apply? 

Denied.
